3: You're locked on. There is no use to run.

I have no... reason to... answer...
...I'm not asking for your opinion. If you don't tell me now, I'll get it out of you sooner or later.
You are, all... just... defilers and bandits... hehe...
You didn't like my work... but you didn't destroy it...
So... you still qualified... as an audience... I won't kill you... hehe...
But... now... you disrupted... my creative flow... You lost... your qualification... as an audience...
I will... have to... erase you... hehe...
We've learned your tricks, this won't work on us now.
Hehe... this is just... for a little... base coloring...
Is that so? That means you've finally decided to stop running. That's more... like it.
